abstract: American authorities are investigating the U.S. division of global banking group HSBC over its compliance with anti-money laundering procedures, according to a regulatory filing.
snippet: American authorities are investigating the U.S. division of global banking group HSBC over its compliance with anti-money laundering procedures, according to a regulatory filing.
lead_paragraph: American authorities are investigating the United States division of the global banking group, HSBC, over its compliance with anti-money laundering procedures, according to a regulatory filing, Reuters reports.

headline.main: HSBC Subject of U.S. Money Laundering Inquiry
